verses.text: And it came to pass, that \w after|strong="H6256"\w* the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* was \w expired|strong="H8666"\w*, at the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* that \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \add to battle\add*, \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* led \w forth|strong="H5090"\w* the \w power|strong="H2428"\w* of the \w army|strong="H6635"\w*, and \w wasted|strong="H7843"\w* the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w*. But \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w tarried|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w*, and \w destroyed|strong="H2040"\w* it.\f + \fr 20.1 \ft after…: Heb. at the return of the year\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* of their \w king|strong="H4428"\w* from off his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* it to \w weigh|strong="H4948"\w* a \w talent|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \add there were\add* \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* in it; and it was set upon \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: and he \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* also \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 20.2 \ft to weigh: Heb. the weight of\f*

And he brought \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* in it, and \w cut|strong="H7787"\w* \add them\add* with \w saws|strong="H4050"\w*, and with \w harrows|strong="H2757"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and with \w axes|strong="H4050"\w*. Even so \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* with all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass after \w this|strong="H0310"\w*, that there \w arose|strong="H5975"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* at \w Gezer|strong="H1507"\w* with the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*; at which \w time|strong="H0227"\w* \w Sibbechai|strong="H5444"\w* the \w Hushathite|strong="H2843"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w Sippai|strong="H5598"\w*, \add that was\add* of the \w children|strong="H3211"\w* of the \w giant|strong="H7497"\w*: and they were \w subdued|strong="H3665"\w*.\f + \fr 20.4 \ft arose: or, continued: Heb. stood\f*\f + \fr 20.4 \ft Gezer: also called, Gob\f*\f + \fr 20.4 \ft Sippai: also called, Saph\f*\f + \fr 20.4 \ft the giant: or, Rapha\f*

And there was \w war|strong="H4421"\w* again with the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*; and \w Elhanan|strong="H0445"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jair|strong="H3265"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w Lahmi|strong="H3902"\w* the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Goliath|strong="H1555"\w* the \w Gittite|strong="H1663"\w*, whose \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \w staff|strong="H6086"\w* \add was\add* like a \w weaver’s|strong="H0707"\w* \w beam|strong="H4500"\w*.\f + \fr 20.5 \ft Jair: also called, Jaare-oregim\f*

And yet again there was \w war|strong="H4421"\w* at \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, where was a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \add great\add* \w stature|strong="H4060"\w*, whose \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w* and \w toes|strong="H0676"\w* \add were\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \add on each hand\add*, and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \add on each foot:\add* and he also was the \w son|strong="H3205"\w* of the \w giant|strong="H7497"\w*.\f + \fr 20.6 \ft great…: Heb. measure\f*\f + \fr 20.6 \ft the son…: Heb. born to the giant, or, Rapha\f*

But when he \w defied|strong="H2778"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimea|strong="H8092"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* him.\f + \fr 20.7 \ft defied: or, reproached\f*\f + \fr 20.7 \ft Shimea: also called Shammah\f*

\w These|strong="H0411"\w* were \w born|strong="H3205"\w* unto the \w giant|strong="H7497"\w* in \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*; and they \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.
